argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tgpcn.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) |
| 2 |  | tgpinv.5 | |- I = ( invg ` G ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_tgpinv | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> I e. ( J Cn J ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_tgpgrp | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 6 | 5, 2 | #P_grpinvcnv | |- ( G e. Grp -> `' I = I ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> `' I = I ) |
| 8 | 7, 3 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> `' I e. ( J Cn J ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ishmeo | |- ( I e. ( J Homeo J ) <-> ( I e. ( J Cn J ) /\ `' I e. ( J Cn J ) ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 8, 9 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> I e. ( J Homeo J ) ) |
